channel.title: [TURBO] Oops, All Neutrals! ver. 1 (1/5+)
channel.description:
# [color=ffa100]Welcome again to a Neutral Tea Party.[/color]
## Rules
1. Follow all regular FoL rules 2. You may talk in the main thread at all* times, even at night. 2.1 *You may not talk while dead. 3. Don’t use **[color=ffa100]My color[/color]** or similar variants. 4. Have fun, and may the best Neutral(s) win.
## Gameplay
Days will be 10 minutes. Night will be 5 minutes. There will be at least 1 of each role, if there are less than 5 roles. In the case that someone has the possibility of winning, the game will not end.
## Executions
We will use Majority and Plurality. If a player receives half (rounded up for odd, +1 for even) of the votes before EoD, they will be lynched. Otherwise, the player with the most votes will be lynched by EoD.
## Journals
No.
## To Join
To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want
## Rolelist:
**[color=ff263b]Stabby McGee[/color] [color=2affff]Logger[/color] [color=f5ff26]Freelance Doctor[/color]**
## Roles:
> # [color=ff263b]Stabby McGee[/color] > *Hehehe. Blood.* > **Reaction (Passive)** - If you are attacked, you will kill your attacker. > **Action (Passive)** - You will attack yourself if you do not kill anyone for one cycle. > **STAB (Night)** - Attack target player. *Inf uses* :Crown: > # *Survive to be the final one*
> # [color=2affff]Logger[/color] > *Just with me and my bros* > **Fellow Logger (Night)** - Visit a player and determine if they are a Logger. *2 uses* > # *Have only Loggers survive to the end of the game.*
> # [color=f5ff26]Freelance Doctor[/color] > *I'm really quite a good person* > **Surgery (Night)** - Heal target player. *Inf Use* > # *Survive to heal 2 people*
# @ Me if you want to add a new role.
## Players:
1: ConfustoLook 2: Marshal 3: 4: 5+:

item.title: [TURBO] Oops, All Neutrals! ver. 1 (1/5+)
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Welcome again to a Neutral Tea Party.

Rules

  1. Follow all regular FoL rules
  2. You may talk in the main thread at all* times, even at night.
    2.1 *You may not talk while dead.
  3. Don’t use My color or similar variants.
  4. Have fun, and may the best Neutral(s) win.

Gameplay

Days will be 10 minutes. Night will be 5 minutes.
There will be at least 1 of each role, if there are less than 5 roles.
In the case that someone has the possibility of winning, the game will not end.

Executions

We will use Majority and Plurality. If a player receives half (rounded up for odd, +1 for even) of the votes before EoD, they will be lynched. Otherwise, the player with the most votes will be lynched by EoD.

Journals

No.

To Join

To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want

Rolelist:

Stabby McGee
Logger
Freelance Doctor

Roles:

Stabby McGee

Hehehe. Blood.
Reaction (Passive) - If you are attacked, you will kill your attacker.
Action (Passive) - You will attack yourself if you do not kill anyone for one cycle.
STAB (Night) - Attack target player. Inf uses

Survive to be the final one

Logger

Just with me and my bros
Fellow Logger (Night) - Visit a player and determine if they are a Logger. 2 uses

Have only Loggers survive to the end of the game.

Freelance Doctor

I’m really quite a good person
Surgery (Night) - Heal target player. Inf Use

Survive to heal 2 people

@ Me if you want to add a new role.
